verses.verse: After<WG3326> these things<WG5023> Jesus<WG2424> shewed<WG5319> himself<WG1438> again<WG3825> to the disciples<WG3101> at<WG1909> the sea<WG2281> of Tiberias<WG5085>; and<WG1161> on this wise<WG3779> shewed<WG5319> he himself.

There were<WG2258> together<WG3674> Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074>, and<WG2532> Thomas<WG2381> called<WG3004> Didymus<WG1324>, and<WG2532> Nathanael<WG3482> of<WG575> Cana<WG2580> in Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG2532> the sons <WG3588> of Zebedee<WG2199>, and<WG2532> two<WG1417> other<WG243> of<WG1537> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>.

Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, I go<WG5217> a fishing<WG232>. They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, We<WG2249> also<WG2532> go<WG2064> with<WG4862> thee<WG4671>. They went forth<WG1831>, and<WG2532> entered<WG305> into<WG1519> a ship<WG4143> immediately<WG2117>; and<WG2532> that<WG1722> <WG1565> night<WG3571> they caught<WG4084> nothing<WG3762>.

But<WG1161> when the morning<WG4405> was<WG1096> now<WG2235> come<WG1096>, Jesus<WG2424> stood<WG2476> on<WG1519> the shore<WG123>: but<WG3305> the disciples<WG3101> knew<WG1492> not<WG3756> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> Jesus<WG2424>.
Then<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Children<WG3813>, have ye<WG2192> any<WG3387> meat<WG4371>? They answered<WG611> him<WG846>, No<WG3756>. Children: or, Sirs

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Cast<WG906> the net<WG1350> on<WG1519> the right<WG1188> side<WG3313> of the ship<WG4143>, and<WG2532> ye shall find<WG2147>. They cast<WG906> therefore<WG3767>, and<WG2532> now<WG3765> they were<WG2480> not<WG3765> able<WG2480> to draw<WG1670> it<WG846> for<WG575> the multitude<WG4128> of fishes<WG2486>.

Therefore<WG3767> that<WG1565> disciple<WG3101> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> loved<WG25> saith<WG3004> unto Peter<WG4074>, It is<WG2076> the Lord<WG2962>. Now<WG3767> when Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> heard<WG191> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> the Lord<WG2962>, he girt<WG1241> his fisher's coat<WG1903> unto him, (for<WG1063> he was<WG2258> naked<WG1131>,) and<WG2532> did cast<WG906> himself<WG1438> into<WG1519> the sea<WG2281>.

And<WG1161> the other<WG243> disciples<WG3101> came<WG2064> in a little ship<WG4142>; (for<WG1063> they were<WG2258> not<WG3756> far<WG3112> from<WG575> land<WG1093>, but<WG235> as it were<WG5613> <WG575> two hundred<WG1250> cubits<WG4083>,) dragging<WG4951> the net<WG1350> with fishes<WG2486>.

As soon<WG5613> then<WG3767> as they were come<WG576> to<WG1519> land<WG1093>, they saw<WG991> a fire of coals<WG439> there, and<WG2532> fish<WG3795> laid<WG2749> thereon<WG1945>, and<WG2532> bread<WG740>.
Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Bring<WG5342> of<WG575> the fish<WG3795> which<WG3739> ye have<WG4084> now<WG3568> caught<WG4084>.

Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> went up<WG305>, and<WG2532> drew<WG1670> the net<WG1350> to<WG1909> land<WG1093> full<WG3324> of great<WG3173> fishes<WG2486>, an hundred<WG1540> and fifty<WG4004> and three<WG5140>: and<WG2532> for all there were so many<WG5118>, yet was<WG5607> not<WG3756> the net<WG1350> broken<WG4977>.

Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Come<WG1205> and dine<WG709>. And<WG1161> none<WG3762> of the disciples<WG3101> durst<WG5111> ask<WG1833> him<WG846>, Who<WG5101> art<WG1488> thou<WG4771>? knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> the Lord<WG2962>.
Jesus<WG2424> then<WG3767> cometh<WG2064>, and<WG2532> taketh<WG2983> bread<WG740>, and<WG2532> giveth<WG1325> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> fish<WG3795> likewise<WG3668>.
This<WG5124> is<WG5319> now<WG2235> the third time<WG5154> that Jesus<WG2424> shewed himself<WG5319> to his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, after that he was risen<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>.

So<WG3767> when<WG3753> they had dined<WG709>, Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> to Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074>, Simon<WG4613>, son of Jonas<WG2495>, lovest thou<WG25> me<WG3165> more than<WG4119> these<WG5130>? He saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Yea<WG3483>, Lord<WG2962>; thou<WG4771> knowest<WG1492> that<WG3754> I love<WG5368> thee<WG4571>. He saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Feed<WG1006> my<WG3450> lambs<WG721>.

He saith<WG3004> to him<WG846> again<WG3825> the second time<WG1208>, Simon<WG4613>, son of Jonas<WG2495>, lovest thou<WG25> me<WG3165>? He saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Yea<WG3483>, Lord<WG2962>; thou<WG4771> knowest<WG1492> that<WG3754> I love<WG5368> thee<WG4571>. He saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Feed<WG4165> my<WG3450> sheep<WG4263>.

He saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846> the third<WG5154> time, Simon<WG4613>, son of Jonas<WG2495>, lovest<WG5368> thou me<WG3165>? Peter<WG4074> was grieved<WG3076> because<WG3754> he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846> the third<WG5154> time, Lovest<WG5368> thou me<WG3165>? And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Lord<WG2962>, thou<WG4771> knowest<WG1492> all things<WG3956>; thou<WG4771> knowest<WG1097> that<WG3754> I love<WG5368> thee<WG4571>. Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Feed<WG1006> my<WG3450> sheep<WG4263>.

Verily<WG281>, verily<WG281>, I say<WG3004> unto thee<WG4671>, When<WG3753> thou wast<WG2258> young<WG3501>, thou girdedst<WG2224> thyself<WG4572>, and<WG2532> walkedst<WG4043> whither<WG3699> thou wouldest<WG2309>: but<WG1161> when<WG3752> thou shalt be old<WG1095>, thou shalt stretch forth<WG1614> thy<WG4675> hands<WG5495>, and<WG2532> another<WG243> shall gird<WG2224> thee<WG4571>, and<WG2532> carry<WG5342> thee whither<WG3699> thou wouldest<WG2309> not<WG3756>.

<WG1161> This<WG5124> spake he<WG2036>, signifying<WG4591> by what<WG4169> death<WG2288> he should glorify<WG1392> God<WG2316>. And<WG2532> when he had spoken<WG2036> this<WG5124>, he saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Follow<WG190> me<WG3427>.

Then<WG1161> Peter<WG4074>, turning about<WG1994>, seeth<WG991> the disciple<WG3101> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> loved<WG25> following<WG190>; which<WG3739> also<WG2532> leaned<WG377> on<WG1909> his<WG846> breast<WG4738> at<WG1722> supper<WG1173>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, Lord<WG2962>, which<WG5101> is he<WG2076> that betrayeth<WG3860> thee<WG4571>?
Peter<WG4074> seeing<WG1492> him<WG5126> saith<WG3004> to Jesus<WG2424>, Lord<WG2962>, and<WG1161> what<WG5101> shall this man<WG3778> do?

Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, If<WG1437> I will<WG2309> that he<WG846> tarry<WG3306> till<WG2193> I come<WG2064>, what<WG5101> is that to<WG4314> thee<WG4571>? follow<WG190> thou<WG4771> me<WG3427>.

Then<WG3767> went<WG1831> this<WG3778> saying<WG3056> abroad<WG1831> among<WG1519> the brethren<WG80>, that<WG3754> that<WG1565> disciple<WG3101> should<WG599> not<WG3756> die<WG599>: yet<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> not<WG3756> unto him<WG846>,<WG3754> He shall<WG599> not<WG3756> die<WG599>; but<WG235>, If<WG1437> I will<WG2309> that he<WG846> tarry<WG3306> till<WG2193> I come<WG2064>, what<WG5101> is that to<WG4314> thee<WG4571>?

This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the disciple<WG3101> which<WG3588> testifieth<WG3140> of<WG4012> these things<WG5130>, and<WG2532> wrote<WG1125> these things<WG5023>: and<WG2532> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> his<WG846> testimony<WG3141> is<WG2076> true<WG227>.

And<WG1161> there are<WG2076> also<WG2532> many<WG4183> other things<WG243> which<WG3745> Jesus<WG2424> did<WG4160>, the which<WG3748>, if<WG1437> they should be written<WG1125> every<WG2596> one<WG1520>, I suppose<WG3633> that even<WG3761> the world<WG2889> itself<WG846> could not<WG3761> contain<WG5562> the books<WG975> that should be written<WG1125>. Amen<WG281>.
